entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -36.7°C
Wind: NW 49 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
